## Type of Change

- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Security / Code Quality improvement

## Quality Control Checklist

### Python Backend

- [ ] Code formatted with Black and isort.
- [ ] Linting passed with Flake8 (PEP8 compliance).
- [ ] Security audit completed with Bandit.
- [ ] Requirements.txt synchronized.
- [ ] All pytest suites passed.

### React Frontend

- [ ] Code formatted (Prettier/ESLint).
- [ ] Linting passed without errors (`npm run lint`).
- [ ] All frontend tests passed (`npm test` / `npm run test`).
- [ ] Production build verified locally (`npm run build`).
- [ ] App starts successfully in development mode (`npm start`).

### Infrastructure and Database

- [ ] Environment variables updated in .env.example (if applicable).
- [ ] MongoDB schema/model changes verified.
- [ ] Integration with GitHub Actions verified.

- [ ] Criterion 2: [Describe how this was met]
